p: Mosquitoes were morphologically identified using taxonomic keys [ 21â€“ 23] at the International Centre of Insect Physiology and Ecology ( icipe) as previously described [ 11]. The number of female Ae. aegypti mosquitoes collected was recorded and used to estimate the vector density. This was done by dividing the total number of female Ae. aegypti mosquitoes collected by the number of traps for each city. Similarly, the blood-fed Ae. aegypti mosquitoes trapped were used to perform a blood meal analysis.
